name: YOUTUBE_UNOFFICIAL__GET_VIDEO_DETAILS
description: Fetches detailed information about a YouTube video including title, author, views, duration, and upload date.

url.description: The full URL of the YouTube video to get details for.

name: YOUTUBE_UNOFFICIAL__GET_CHANNEL_INFO
description: Fetches information about a YouTube channel including title, subscriber count, and video count.

url.description: The full URL of the YouTube channel to get information for.

name: YOUTUBE_UNOFFICIAL__SEARCH_VIDEOS
description: Searches for YouTube videos based on a query and returns a list of matching videos.

query.description: The search query to find videos for.

max_results.description: The maximum number of videos to return. Defaults to 10.

name: YOUTUBE_UNOFFICIAL__GET_VIDEO_COMMENTS
description: Fetches comments from a YouTube video for community engagement analysis.

url.description: The full URL of the YouTube video to get comments from.

max_results.description: The maximum number of comments to return. Defaults to 10.

name: YOUTUBE_UNOFFICIAL__GET_VIDEO_TRANSCRIPT
description: Fetches the transcript/captions from a YouTube video for content analysis and summarization.

url.description: The full URL of the YouTube video to get transcript from.

language.description: Preferred language for the transcript (e.g., 'en' for English). If not available, will use video's default language.
